properties.areaDesc: Webster, MO; Douglas, MO; Wright, MO; Greene, MO
properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 2 at 3:19PM CST until March 2 at 8:30PM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
At 317 PM CST, the Department of Transportation reported that
flooding of low water crossings continued in the advisory area.

Creeks, streams, and low water crossings will be especially
susceptible to the dangers of flooding.
Locations in the advisory include...
Southeastern Springfield...       Mountain Grove...
Rogersville...                    Ava...
Seymour...                        Mansfield...
Fordland...                       Norwood...
Diggins...                        Turners...
Brushyknob...                     Gentryville...
Rome...                           Vanzant...
Squires...                        Goodhope...
Galloway...                       Drury...
Dogwood...

This advisory includes but is not limited to the following low water
crossings...
Route FF at Hunter Creek east of Ava...
Route FF at Turkey Creek east of Ava...
Route Y at Cowskin Creek 3 miles west of Ava...
Highway 125 just south of Highway 60...
and Route Z at Finley Creek 3 miles southeast of Fordland.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

NWSheadline: THE FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CST FOR SOUTHERN WEBSTER...DOUGLAS...SOUTHERN WRIGHT AND SOUTHEASTERN GREENE COUNTIES
